column1: Next Thursday January 23rd I'll be hosting an open house event at my Antioch office from 6:00-7:30 PM. I'm looking forward to hearing from you about the issues that are important to our community! https://t.co/KrjK7MuSDH
I'll be hosting the an open house event at my Stockton office next Wednesday January 22nd from 6:00-7:30 PM. Hope to see you there! https://t.co/qFlGvApzTU
The #climatecrisis is the greatest threat of our time. We need bold action and that’s why I’m proud to join my E&C colleagues to announce our #CLEANfuture proposal. https://t.co/lDsL1Uq7iW

One year ago today the House introduced #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act of 2019. We passed this legislation shortly after but @senatemajldr refuses to bring this crucial bill to the Senate floor. RT to tell him it’s time to vote to #EndGunViolence.

Our founding fathers created a system of checks and balances to ensure this kind of reckless behavior could be stopped by a co-equal branch of government. We cannot allow the sole power in the executive to force our nation into another senseless war.
But once again this president has acted without any thought for a long-term national security strategy and put more Americans’ lives in danger.
None of us will shed a tear for Qasem Suleimani - he was a murderer responsible for the deaths of hundreds of American troops and thousands of innocent civilians.

With no congressional approval or consultation the president launched targeted airstrikes and has now ordered thousands more soldiers to a region of the world that he promised to withdraw American troops from.
I'm getting ready to speak on the House floor in support of the articles of impeachment. You can can follow along with the debate below. https://t.co/ZlsGQvH2kk

If the president's actions bare no consequence future presidents may act without constraint and American democracy will be at an end. Therefore I will uphold my sworn duty to defend the Constitution and vote to impeach this president. https://t.co/MHTVgPk2UT

California's open enrollment period to sign-up for health insurance continues until January 31st. Those who sign-up by December 15th will be covered starting the first of the year. For more information visit Covered California's website: https://t.co/zIAm88VfPL

Today I cast my vote for Marta and the millions of others struggling with the skyrocketing price of prescription medication. Passing H.R. 3 is the first step to #LowerDrugCosts for the American people. https://t.co/NCGa76A9ZE

Coastal communities are already suffering from a rise in sea levels increased flooding & severe weather due to #ClimateChange. @HouseDemocrats just passed bipartisan #OceanClimateAction bills to protect the 42% of Americans living in these areas. https://t.co/lrxXEzW5em

Today marks two years since @POTUS and @FCC repealed #NetNeutrality rules. We passed the #SaveTheInternet Act in the House earlier this year and I’m joining @SenateDems in demanding an immediate vote on this bill in the Senate! https://t.co/FU5Iy8CvtD
There is nothing more sacred in our democracy than the right to vote. That’s why @HouseDemocrats passed #HR4 to put an end to egregious voter suppression tactics and #RestoreTheVote #ForThePeople.

Because of Trump’s #FamilySeparation policy:  ❌ Thousands of families have been torn apart  ❌ Parents have been deported without their children  ❌ The Admin has yet to reunify all separated families  #DontLookAway - watch the panel on #USCCRReports ⬇️ https://t.co/H8cRdkDLLO
Thanks to all the volunteers who came out to help serve our community! https://t.co/a1Cih4LHfq
Wishing you and yours a very happy Thanksgiving!

SNAP is the first line of defense against hunger and food insecurity those in need. But this administration wants to cut this crucial program risking the health of our most vulnerable population: our children.  #1MillionKids https://t.co/nTTrvNX4LJ

Across the country many family members take on the role of caregiver for loved ones in need. We can all support these selfless individuals this #NationalFamilyCaregiversMonth with simple acts of kindness such as sending a card helping them run an errand or preparing a meal. https://t.co/Rn0KUyYRhL

A persistent gender-based wage gap continues to harm women their families and the economy – and it is particularly damaging for Latinas. We must #DemandMore and pass the #PaycheckFairness Act now. #LatinaEqualPay

I had a great time this weekend at the NAACP Stockton Branch Freedom Fund Banquet. It was an honor to help recognize the six awardees for their contributions and service to our community. https://t.co/Kr22YkRH6j
Our children shouldn't have to go to school in fear. The House has passed multiple commonsense gun safety bills and it's past time for the Senate to act. #EnoughIsEnough https://t.co/S0XKlK1Di0

2019 marks the 100th anniversary of Congressional passage of the 19th Amendment affirming women’s right to vote. But women's rights are still not guaranteed in the Constitution. That’s why I’m proud to cosponsor the Equal Rights Amendment. #ERANow! #ERAHearing

#DACA recipients are integral members of our communities. They've built their lives here and should have the opportunity to continue contributing to our communities without the constant threat of deportation. For DACA recipients #HomeisHere and I am proud to stand with them.

Over 4 million Californians have diabetes & struggle with medical costs that are approximately 2.3x higher than those without. Last year @CDCgov provided more than $6 million for prevention & education programs & I'll continue to support this critical funding. #CountMeInADA

This administration wants to allow widespread discrimination in our health care system jeopardizing many Americans' care – including women & the LGBTQ community. We can’t allow this. That’s why I’m proud to cosponsor the #PutPatientsFirst Act to stop this harmful rule. https://t.co/mWCTsoMsnN

It was a privilege to attend today’s #VeteransDay Ceremony in Antioch and to recognize this year’s Antioch Veteran of the Year Mr. Denny Hollison. Thank you to all of our nation’s veterans for their service and their sacrifice. https://t.co/ZY9EQWiHtD

President Trump is intentionally and willfully condemning future generations to a world of catastrophic climate change and conflict. Our withdrawal from the Paris Climate Accord will abandon America's leadership at a time when the world needs it most. https://t.co/8QhlgIhtmA

It was a privilege to sit down with Ivan a Stocktonian and @NALC_National Local Hero Award winner who courageously helped a young girl escape a dangerous and horrible situation. https://t.co/pjdPx0Sy6R

Diwali celebrates the inner light that protects us during the darkest times. I want to thank the Mountain House Sikh community for inviting me to the join them during the Diwali Mela Festival of Lights. https://t.co/EHRWuxk1wT
#VaccinesWork to save children’s lives from deadly diseases. Over 400 million children are vaccinated each year to #EndPolio and we are closer than ever to eradicating this disease. #WorldPolioDay

Great turn-out at the Stockton Walk to End Alzheimer’s this past weekend! Over the last five years Congress has quadrupled Alzheimer’s research funding but we still have more work to do. I’ll continue to support and push for federal investment in research until we find a cure. https://t.co/HpwcxmxOiH
Thanks to the students from McCaffrey Middle School who stopped by the Capitol today! It was great to hear from such bright and inquisitive young people. https://t.co/kjCeB5DVBs

Federal investment in neuroscience research is crucial to medical discovery. As @SfNtweets holds its annual meeting I will continue to push for much-needed funding to advance our understanding of the brain and the nervous system and to combat neurodegenerative illnesses.

The cost of prescription medication is skyrocketing and Americans demand that Congress take action. H.R. 3 would give Medicare the authority to negotiate #LowerDrugCosts for the American people. https://t.co/BGvwfSDGpL
Open enrollment has begun. Californians can sign-up for health insurance coverage from now until January 31st by visiting the Covered California website. https://t.co/zIAm88VfPL

The Outsourcing Accountability Act will bring real transparency at a time when consumers are becoming increasingly conscious about where they spend and invest their money. We deserve to know if companies are exploiting these practices at the expense of American workers. https://t.co/gdKn7u26l2
My thoughts are with his family and the people of his district whom he so loved.

His faith led him to a life of public service and his stalwart belief in equality and democracy fueled his pursuit for truth and justice. To many of us Elijah was the moral compass for this hallowed chamber.
He was a man of principle who led by example – always expounding on our shared humanity rather than exploiting our differences cultivating friendships on both sides of the aisle.

Today our country mourns the loss of a great champion of truth and my colleagues and I mourn the loss of a dear friend. Elijah Cummings came to Congress to represent his community in Baltimore and throughout his tenure he represented much more.
My statement on the D.C. Circuit Court's #NetNeutrality decision: https://t.co/f0ziNmiD6o
Thank you for your leadership in the Senate! https://t.co/Z6elF5yVqr

Congress must act to ensure Americans’ safety. PFAS are dangerous chemicals found in drinking water throughout the country. I was proud to stand with my colleagues today to support congressional action to address this pressing issue. https://t.co/PGSZxZqWrr

Yesterday @repbenraylujan @RepYvetteClarke and I introduced the Digital Equity Act – a critical piece of legislation to close gaps in broadband adoption and digital literacy. #digitalequitynow https://t.co/H9LtnMc1id

Our oceans absorb 1/3 of CO2 emissions and 90% of heat from #ClimateChange. But right now they’re under extreme stress resulting in increased warming and ocean acidity. Today @NRDems vote on 10 #OceanClimateAction bills. We must protect our oceans to save our planet.
To fulfill our sworn duty Congress must move forward with an impeachment inquiry. Brazen lies have been a hallmark of this presidency and it is now time for a reckoning. 2/2

When I came to Washington I swore an oath to uphold the Constitution and I do not take that responsibility lightly. The allegations against the president are grave and they are a threat to our democracy and national security. 1/2
Excited to join my colleague @HurdOnTheHill for this important conversation on #AI and military readiness. #TheAtlanticFest https://t.co/PTRKEBXMyq

Americans and people around the world expect the United States to lead on critical issues but time is running out. We need a bold agenda to combat #climatechange and that starts with the passage of H.R. 9 the #ClimateActionNow Act. https://t.co/Gilaz4vHnG
Under the Trump Administration @EPAAWheeler apparently gets to decide what is and is not a science issue and overrule an entire board of actual scientists. https://t.co/3s96NTK3HL

Clean water is a fundamental human right. The #DirtyWaterRule is an unprecedented attack on the health and safety of all Americans putting the water sources for tens of millions of people at risk. We must put #PeopleBeforePolluters and #ProtectOurWater.
Excited to join @POLITICOLive for an important discussion on AI. #POLITICOAI https://t.co/6alj5GL8Jc

With a former coal lobbyist at the helm the EPA has been reduced to a shell of what it once was as President Trump continues to ram through a big-business agenda that will ultimately make our water less safe for use and consumption. https://t.co/7wZJjCaR6W
Thanks to @TheBridgeWork for the opportunity to discuss what I'm working on in Congress & as co-chair of the AI Caucus. Check out the full profile here: https://t.co/doDnPu7jff

By following this deliberative process the Judiciary Committee’s inquiry will be a transparent and thorough examination of current evidence. These proceedings will answer questions that are critical to determining if impeachment is necessary. 2/2
I support Chairman Nadler’s decision to open a formal impeachment inquiry. Americans deserve to know the truth and many are gravely concerned by the president’s dubious actions. 1/2
Hispanic Americans make our communities more vibrant and prosperous. Happy #HispanicHeritageMonth to all those celebrating in my district and across the country!

Dreamers TPS & DED recipients are important members of our communities in California & across the country. I was happy to meet with @carecensf and representatives from my district to discuss permanent protections for these groups and their families. https://t.co/hLO88Wiuos

Last Congress Republicans opened 19 million acres of federally protected untouched Alaska wilderness to big oil. Opening the Arctic Refuge would destroy one of the last unspoiled places on Earth. This is no place for drilling & today I was proud to vote to #ProtectTheArctic. https://t.co/1yfr3eUGTw

Thanks to representatives from @AmericanCancer for stopping by my office to discuss their legislative priorities. I’ve long supported federal investments in research and I’ll continue to advocate for the critical funding needed in the continued search for a cure. https://t.co/XHDCQTtFCv

President Trump wants to open our coasts to more oil & gas drilling but coastal drilling destroys beaches businesses and communities' way of life. That’s why I voted for @RepCunningham's bill to #ProtectOurCoast. https://t.co/dgXdAQqnZ7

Over 70% of Americans support banning high-capacity magazines which are too often used in mass shootings. Gun violence is an epidemic but we can make our communities safer with rational legislative action. That’s why I’m proud to cosponsor the #KeepAmericansSafeAct. https://t.co/tZoQOSoOT5

Many of us remember exactly where we were #WhenTheWorldStopped 18 years ago. Today we honor the memory of those lost and pay tribute to the heroes who risked their own lives to save others. We must #NeverForget. https://t.co/RQIO9u0xy7
A study by the @IPS_DC found that the average Black family would need 228 years to obtain the wealth of a White family in the 21st Century. #400YearsLater

#400YearsLater the Transatlantic Slave Trade is still the largest coerced migration of human beings in the world's history. Slavery officially lasted in the US for 246 years & the psychological & economic toll has consequences to this day.  1/2

I recently had the privilege of presenting Mr. Robert Welker with the National Defense Service Medal and the Vietnam Service Medal. It was an honor to thank Mr. Welker who is a Navy veteran for his service during the Vietnam War and his service to our country. https://t.co/Di68CwD04e

Thousands of #Dreamers in my district & across the country need permanent protection from deportation. While the Trump administration threatens their legal status forcing them to live in fear @TheDemocrats are working to #ProtectTheDream for all #DACA #TPS & #DED recipients. https://t.co/HyokyMm3Sr

Great turnout at last week’s town halls! Many of you came with important questions about some of our nation’s most pressing issues and we had a very informative discussion about how to move our country forward. https://t.co/odtAq0o0eT
I hope you can join me for a town hall in Stockton on Friday August 30th from 6:30 PM to 7:30 PM at Cesar Chavez High School. https://t.co/ULMIJN7qTN

While the President is playing political games and backpedaling on his commitments gun violence continues to devastate communities across our nation. It’s been 175 days since the House passed the bipartisan #HR8 and commonsense #HR1112. The Senate must #DoSomething.
I hope you can join me for a joint town hall with my colleague @RepDeSaulnier on Thursday August 29th from 6:30 PM to 8:00 PM at the Antioch Community Center. https://t.co/pMbmyBCGJZ

For 7 years #DACA has successfully protected 800K young people from deportation. These #Dreamers are our neighbors family & friends. But the Trump administration is threatening their future in the U.S. That's why @HouseDemocrats are continuing to fight to #ProtectTheDream.

1 in 7 Californians relies on social security. As we celebrate 84 years of this critical program let us recommit to ensuring its longevity and expanding it to meet Americans' changing needs. #SocSec84 https://t.co/g1phF7uTC2
I had a great time meeting with the men and women undertaking the critical work at our National Labs! https://t.co/yZX061MKHh

In my district the Delta is home to many endangered and protected species. This ecosystem and our local economy depend on their survival yet once again the president is choosing the interests of industry over the interests of the American public. https://t.co/mKy8eDTQqU

Right now @senatemajldr is blocking the progress of two practical pieces of legislation that would enhance our background check system. #EnoughIsEnough. He & other Republicans who are in the pocket of the NRA must answer: Whose side are you on?  https://t.co/UU6ZEMgfba

Americans are sick & tired of the demands & desires of special interest coming before their needs. We need a constitutional amendment to end the culture of corruption that is fueled by our #campaignfinance system. That's why my proposal would eliminate PACs & ban #darkmoney. https://t.co/m37gruIiK4

As National Parks & Rec Month comes to an end I hope you’ll join me in thanking our own California Parks Department for taking care of the most diverse collection of natural cultural and recreational resources in our state. #GameOnJuly

Across the nation communities regularly face the tragedy of gun violence. This is an epidemic that can only be curbed by bold actions but we must all share in the political will to advance reforms. For the sake of all Americans we can & must do better. https://t.co/XlyIF8T8lE

Today the House passed the #StopBadRobocalls Act – which includes an amendment that I offered to increase penalties against the most egregious violators of the law. This commonsense legislation is critical for protecting consumers and putting an end to these abusive practices. https://t.co/o9cRuIPV4V

Over a million Americans are at risk of losing their pensions if the House fails to pass the #ButchLewisAct - putting their families’ financial security and future at risk. No one should live in fear that their hard-earned retirement savings will collapse.

Today the House votes to #PassthePASTAct which would end the inhumane practice of soring #horses by intentionally inflicting pain to their feet in order to win prizes. I'm proud to cosponsor H.R. 693 & call on the Senate to swiftly pass this bill & end this senseless cruelty.
Achieving net zero carbon pollution by 2050 is necessary to protect the climate public health and our economy. Combating this crisis is still possible but only if we #ActOnClimate now. #100by50
Today we witnessed Robert Mueller testify under oath that his report does NOT exonerate the President. #MuellerHearings https://t.co/R7cPOewdMH
I’m excited to join @POLITICOLive for a discussion about #AI and the federal government. Tune in here to follow along: https://t.co/ygbEedRCnc https://t.co/qvJy2p4MEm

Today @EnergyCommerce passed the #StopBadRobocalls Act – a crucial step to put consumers back in control of their phones. I’m proud to cosponsor this bill which includes an amendment I offered with @RepBillFlores to increase penalties for the most egregious violators of the law.

Science is under attack. This administration has prohibited federal scientists from speaking about climate change & climate data has been scrubbed from many gov't websites. We must protect their work to safeguard public health & our environment. #ScienceNotSilence #ForThePeople https://t.co/Mm1rAXRwfk

#OTD in 1969 #Apollo11 sent three astronauts on a trajectory to the moon. Today we celebrate this achievement and recognize that our unique American spirit has always given us the courage to dream big and the resiliency to follow through. #Apollo50th
This president has shown himself over and over to be a racist. These attacks have only unified Democrats and reminded the American people why they decided to change the makeup of Congress in 2018.
#ICEraids are expected to take place this weekend in cities across the country. Make sure you #KnowYourRights. https://t.co/6WsUs6MxoS

Secretary Acosta is defending an indefensible decision that protected a predator and robbed his victims of a chance for justice.   Americans have no confidence in his ability to head the department charged with fighting human trafficking.   He should resign immediately.

Due to the the multi-employer pension crisis 1.5 MILLION retirees workers & their families are set to lose benefits they earned throughout a lifetime of hard work. By advancing the #ButchLewisAct @WaysMeansCmte will ensure all retirees are guaranteed the benefits they deserve.
Congratulations! #USWMNT https://t.co/vx4kqp6Nv8
Wishing everyone a safe and happy 4th of July! Happy #IndependenceDay! https://t.co/IEtVFrJsc7

The #SCOTUS #gerrymandering decision highlights the need for Congress to take action. Last week I secured funding in one of the House spending packages for @NSF to study & establish science-based best practices for congressional redistricting so we can ensure a fair process.

The spreading of political disinformation on social media poses grave consequences to our nation’s democracy. That’s why my @EnergyCommerce colleagues & I sent a letter to Mark Zuckerberg with questions about @facebook's handling of the doctored video of Speaker Pelosi. https://t.co/PGK1ZN2t26
Two amendments that I introduced were included in yesterday's spending package that passed on the House floor. #CBD #Gerrymandering https://t.co/GosfrjVidJ

Six years ago SCOTUS gutted the Voting Rights Act in the Shelby County v. Holder decision. Millions of Americans were left vulnerable to racial discrimination & voter disenfranchisement unraveling the legacy of this momentous legislation. We must #RestoreTheVote & pass #HR4.

Small businesses are the backbone of our economy creating jobs and driving innovation. H.R.3351 makes substantial investments in resources for entrepreneurs & small businesses – like the 30000 in my district – by providing access to training & materials to help them succeed.

We must renew our commitment to protecting the air we breathe the water we drink and the planet we all call home. That’s why I support the FY20 Interior-Environment bill which includes $37.3 billion to protect the environment ensure clean air & water & preserve wildlife. https://t.co/FqbZOJw1b0

I introduced two amendments that passed on the House floor this week. One directs the FDA to set safe consumption levels for #CBD products and the other tackles the widespread problem of #gerrymandering. https://t.co/DKW3j2QIb3

With a recorded 70.8 million displaced people fleeing violence & persecution around the world there is still much work to do. That’s why I'm proud to join my colleagues in recognizing #WorldRefugeeDay by cosponsoring H.Res. 444 to reaffirm U.S. commitment to protecting refugees.

Millions of women #LGBTQ Americans and people of color rely on the Affordable Care Act but the Trump administration is threatening their health by trying to roll back critical protections. We need to #PutPatientsFirst and keep discrimination out of our healthcare.

@HouseDemocrats are pushing forward funding legislation #ForThePeople. That why the FY2020 Commerce-Justice-Science bill provides $74 billion to promote civil rights reduce gun violence combat climate change & address many other issues that are important to Americans. https://t.co/z9b5TdAMpl

Today my colleagues & I sent a letter to @AjitPaiFCC urging him to move forward with taking a fresh look at the 5.9 GHz band. It’s time we re-examine how this band is being used & how to allocate it in a way that meets the demands of our times & best serves the American people. https://t.co/fWZUSKBuUQ

The Trump administration is moving forward with their #DirtyPowerScam – gutting the #CleanPowerPlan & rolling back the progress we’ve made on climate change solutions. @EPAAWheeler is once again putting polluter profits over Americans’ best interests.
Thank you my friend! And a big thanks to all for the warm birthday wishes. https://t.co/DdAw0i72UO

Today marks the longest period in U.S. history without an increase to the federal minimum wage since it's establishment in 1938. No one working full-time in this country should be living in poverty. It's time to #RaiseTheWage. https://t.co/jiEz1DtslR

Hate has no place here. As we celebrate #Pride let us recognize the important history of the #LGBT community and that we still have more to do to make our nation a fairer more just country. https://t.co/O0mUaToC6A
Whether he doesn’t understand the law or doesn’t care about it the president’s indifference on election interference is a threat to our democracy and to our very way of life.

Once again President Trump is using his media platform to make lawless activity seem normal. But the American people understand that any foreign entity offering campaign information has ulterior motives.
I’m looking forward to continuing to work together on this important issue. https://t.co/CJZ4fkAqqR

As co-chair of the Congressional #AICaucus I was excited to host a roundtable conversation today with leading experts from @StanfordHAI. Thanks to @drfeifei Dr. John Etchemendy & @MPSellitto for an engaging discussion about their work at the Institute & emerging trends in #AI. https://t.co/UNtxtjNdsn

More than 5000 people are diagnosed with ALS every year. I’ve long supported federal funding for ALS research and will continue to do so until a cure is found. Thanks to @alsassociation for meeting with me to discuss how Congress can continue to support #ALSAdvocacy. https://t.co/FtrUFf70v3

#PublicCharge is a rule that would allow the Trump administration to restrict green cards based on income health English proficiency age & use of public programs. This proposal is another cruel attack on #immigrant communities.

For the first time in more than 20 years we have an appropriations package that includes funding for @CDCgov & @NIH to conduct gun violence prevention research. I'm proud to stand with my @HouseDemocrats colleagues in the fight for a safer America #ForThePeople.

Nearly 30 MILLION Americans are living without health insurance and another 40 million cannot afford their co-pays or deductibles. We can do better. Today’s @WaysmeansCmte hearing on universal coverage is a step toward making #MedicareforAll a reality.

Congratulations to this year’s Military Academy appointees! These six exemplary students from California’s 9th Congressional District are going on to attend the Military Academy Naval Academy and Air Force Academy. https://t.co/zpFjcf8wM3

It’s been more than 2 months since the House passed the #SaveTheNet Act and Americans across the political spectrum agree that we need to restore #NetNeutrality rules. But today @SenateMajLdr blocked a vote on it in the Senate burying it in his legislative graveyard. https://t.co/3fkovF8UtB

On one of the darkest days in our nation’s history our 9/11 first responders risked everything to help their fellow Americans. With the 9/11 Victim Compensation Fund set to expire we cannot turn our backs on these heroes. #Renew911VCF

As we celebrate #ImmigrantHeritageMonth the House passage of the Dream & Promise Act is a reminder that much our nation’s success is due to our commitment to welcoming new communities. #HR6 https://t.co/MQ787cJzqi
Great conversations yesterday at our 3rd #ScienceOnTheHill event! Thanks to all those who attended and participated! https://t.co/cTLBwJAwCE
On the 75th Anniversary of D-Day we remember the bravery and sacrifice of all those who fought at Normandy and honor their legacy. #DDAY75 https://t.co/F0AkOtZDhO

100 days ago the House passed #HR8 the Bipartisan Background Checks Act. Today my colleagues and I called on @senatemajldr to bring this commonsense legislation to the Senate floor for a vote because #EnoughIsEnough. #EndGunViolence https://t.co/0SsnFXEQ4j

More than 90% of excess heat & about 1/3 of carbon dioxide in our atmosphere is absorbed by the ocean. As we continue to take #ClimateActionNow we must also #ProtectOurOceans. That’s why I’m proud to support critical legislation essential to the preservation of our oceans. https://t.co/YcGzvSHHpc

Today we heard from many #FosterYouthVoices about their personal experiences & how we can improve our child welfare system. I had the privilege of hosting a young woman named Erica who has become an advocate on this issue & many other issues affecting young people in America. https://t.co/oXKpjONfa7

Over 415k children are living in foster care in the U.S. Tomorrow I'll be participating in #FosterYouthShadowDay as foster youth from across the country will meet with Members of Congress to talk about how government can improve our child welfare system.  #FosterYouthVoices

Two years ago today the president decided to pull out of the Paris Climate Agreement and put the future of nation’s economy and public health at risk. I voted for the #ClimateActionNow Act which blocks Trump from removing us. America can either lead or be left behind.

Congratulations to the 8th graders of Hazelton Elementary! I’m never more optimistic about our nation’s future than when I’m surrounded by bright young people who will lead the next generation. https://t.co/WwGcxY3lJN
Looking forward to a great discussion next week! Hope you can join us! https://t.co/AJ6Ktn849P

On #MemorialDay we pay tribute to the brave men and women who gave the ultimate sacrifice to protect our country and all that we stand for. Thank you to our nation’s heroes and their families who also sacrifice so much so that their loved ones can serve. https://t.co/j0CTilVaHw

Since abandoning the Iran Deal the U.S. has forfeited its position of diplomatic strength in pursuit of a reckless ideology. The President is now escalating his aggression by deploying 1500 additional soldiers to the Middle East which may provoke a wider conflict.

I recently introduced bipartisan legislation to put the federal government on a path to harness the full potential of AI in a responsible way – one that will enhance government’s ability to fulfill its mission create new economic opportunities & reduce potential harmful effects. https://t.co/3kwqvMuULP

We exist because of the diverse array of living organisms all around us. But because of humans 1 million species are in danger of extinction. If we don’t #ActOnClimate & #StopExtinction we could lose the animals & plants that make Earth livable. #InternationalBiodiversityDay

To mitigate and combat the threats of #climatechange our nation must #ActOnClimate now and invest in a clean energy future for all Americans. That’s why I’m proud to support the #LIFTAmerica Act which would fund the installation of solar panels in underserved communities. https://t.co/Flxm2W2cE7

Yesterday’s Grid Innovation and Infrastructure Expo featured cutting edge technologies that are paving the way for a cleaner modernized power grid. Thanks to my co-hosts @boblatta @Edison_Electric @NEMAupdates and @gridwisedc. https://t.co/qQ0yRAN2lq

100 years ago the House of Representatives passed the 19th Amendment. Today we’re celebrating this milestone in our nation’s history by wearing a yellow rose in honor of those who fought to give women a voice in our government. #WomensVote100 https://t.co/IgC0hkd3a9
Mr. President stop provoking and start talking. Use all diplomatic channels to ease tensions with Iran. https://t.co/eWqhRJpWBv

We cannot claim to be the land of the free until all our citizens have equal protection under the law. For many #LGBTQ Americans that is not the reality. But today @HouseDemocrats have said no more by passing #HR5 because fairness & equality are our nation's core values. https://t.co/HhH5w3YhAb
